name: Taking Roots
description: "Taking Roots" is a 2D Unity platform racing game designed for the Global Game Jam. The game is a two-player competition where players race to collect and sell vegetables for profit. The game features fast-paced and intense gameplay, with obstacles and power-ups to overcome and outsmart the other player. With colorful and vibrant graphics and challenging levels, "Taking Roots" promises to be an exciting and fun experience for all players. Get ready to put your green thumb to the test and grow your way to victory in "Taking Roots"!
